Item.StartupSpeech: I've been feeling under the weather lately... Say! I know exactly what would help me get ship-shape in no time. Ever heard of a Sea-Slug Cocktail? The recipe's simple: Brinebulb Juice mixed with exactly one plump Sea-Slug. Bring me one and I'll teach ya a thing or two about the sea.

MidQuestSkeleton.TextToWrite: Did you need some more help with making the Sea-Slug Cocktail? `
MidQuestSkeleton.SelectableOptions: Where can I find a Sea-Slug again? ~Take your fishing rod to any body of water and start fishing!,Nevermind ~ ExitDialogue

Item.CompletionSpeech: Wonderful. Ned hastily gulbs down the cocktail, sea-slug and all. Ahhh that hit the spot... Thanks for that.
